name: AJAX (itch)
description:
Investigate the source of corruption as robot E-TBTP. 

Controls:

  • Move: Arrow Keys / WASD
  • Jump: Z / Space
  • Dash: X / Shift
  • Jetpack: Hold Jump in mid-air.
  • Jetpack Burst: Quickly tap the jump button twice.

Credits:

  • pokevii
    • Director, Programming, Level Design, Additional Art
  • Luggi
    • Robot Art and Animations, Background Art, Tilesets, Level Design
  • Redacted
    • Music, "Corruption"
  • Altiami
    • UI Programming & Design
  • Miyagiie
    • Key Artwork 

u can beat the game in like 3 minutes if ur good its pretty short :)
